inputs.sentence: Roger Federer (born 8 August 1981) is a Swiss professional tennis player.

inputs.sentence: As of 20 June 2021, 2.66 billion doses of COVID‑19 vaccine have been administered worldwide based on official reports from national health agencies.

inputs.sentence: The first known case of COVID-19 was identified in Wuhan, China in December 2019.

inputs.sentence: On Feb. 25, 2021, Twitter announced Super Follows, a subscription service allowing content creators to receive payments for their content.

inputs.sentence: In August 2018, Apple became the first publicly traded U.S. company to be valued at over $1 trillion.
